/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/diff_evolution_solver.dir/src/diff_evolution_solver/solver.cu.o CMakeFiles/diff_evolution_solver.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o ../diff_evolution_solver   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.1/lib64/libcudart_static.a  -L/home/chris/parallel_diff_evolution/-lpthread  -L/home/chris/parallel_diff_evolution/dl  -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
